name: openclaw.public.dappnode.eth
shortDescription: Personal AI assistant gateway with multi-LLM support
description:
OpenClaw is a powerful, self-hosted AI agent gateway that runs on your own devices. It provides a unified interface for interacting with multiple LLM providers (OpenAI, Anthropic Claude, Google Gemini, local models via Ollama). Features include:

- **Web UI & API**: Full-featured web interface at port 18789
- **Multi-Channel Messaging**: WhatsApp, Telegram, Slack, Discord, Matrix, and more
- **Agent Orchestration**: Claude AI integration with tool use and autonomous agents
- **Code Execution**: Sandboxed environment for running code
- **Canvas UI**: Visual interactions and image generation
- **Voice Support**: Text-to-speech and speech-to-text capabilities

Run your own AI infrastructure with full control over your data and API keys.
author: DAppNode Association <admin@dappnode.io>

exposable.name: OpenClaw Web UI
exposable.description: Web interface for interacting with AI agents

exposable.name: OpenClaw Bridge API
exposable.description: Bridge API for external integrations and webhooks

exposable.name: OpenClaw Terminal
exposable.description: Web-based terminal for direct shell access to the container

exposable.name: OpenClaw Setup Wizard
exposable.description: Web-based setup wizard for easy configuration

warnings.onRemove: Removing this package will delete all your OpenClaw configuration, conversation history, and cached data. Make sure to create a backup first.
